experiences: I worked on a custom agile development team to take business application needs from inception to deployment
I engaged closely with SQL databases, C#, flyway, ASP.NET / .NET Model-view-controller (MVC) applications, and other programming tools/frameworks
I gained exposure to Azure and AWS cloud platforms
For my master's degree poster project and thesis I studied deleted file recovery in the Ext4 file system as I found there to be a gap in this research.
I developed a command line digital forensics tool, using a bash shell script, and later converted into a python script, to recover deleted files from a system that uses Ext4.
My work was accepted at the 2024 DFRWS conference at Louisiana and I received a scholarship from the National Science Foundation to attend.
